title: OwnerSeller
author: OwnerSeller
created_time: June 09, 2023, 08:09:34 PMLast edit: October 15, 2024, 08:43:49 PM by OwnerSeller
content: 1 sub = 1$5 sub = 5$10 sub = 10$25 sub = 25$50 sub = 50$100 sub = 100$Im gifting subs with my personal account , anonymous gifting or new account by your choosed name.There is no limit for buying gifted subs.​(If you want gift subs on your account ask me on discord)Contact: add me on Discord: Owner#7224 or santaownerPayment: Crypto , Binance Pay , Binance Gift Card(Paypal,Debit/Credit Card) QuoteMy service motto = More subs = More hype = More renew = More viewer to stay​3 month sub = 6$6 month sub = 12$12 month sub = 24$

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Are these Turkish subs? Stolen credit card? Something doesn't seem right here since a sub on Twitch is $5. Please explain why you're selling so cheap.

comments.author: OwnerSeller
comments.created_time: June 09, 2023, 08:40:00 PMLast edit: October 29, 2023, 02:35:49 AM by OwnerSeller
comments.body: Subs from Turkey.Im using my own card for buying.

comments.author: STT
comments.created_time: June 09, 2023, 09:57:22 PMLast edit: June 09, 2023, 10:17:59 PM by STT
comments.body: Prices in Turkey and Argentina are both unbelievable.   Could you supply gifted steam games also possibly or is that barred trade, can I add you on steam for future maybe?  I often have people in a rush buying games together for multiplayer and theres always one person who doesnt have the full price available to spend which spoils the evening schedule etc.    The massive gap between countries for the same exact product has to be some kind of opportunity but also I doubt its too easy exactly because its so obvious.A sub is for 1 month, I think thats not too risky a purchase and alot of games are variable in price and next Steam sale is this month I think.

comments.author: OwnerSeller
comments.body: There is no risk to use my service.I sold over 10+k subs.Discord: Owner#7224 or santaownerIf you have more questions , feel free to ask anything.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.created_time: June 18, 2023, 05:54:19 PMLast edit: June 18, 2023, 06:33:25 PM by Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: OwnerSeller on June 09, 2023, 08:09:34 PMIm gifting subs with my personal account , anonymous gifting or new account by your choosed name.There is no limit for buying gifted subs.​(If you want gift subs on your account ask me on discord)Contact: add me on Discord: Owner#7224 or santaownerWhy do we need to use Discord? If I want subscriptions for several streamers, what do you need to make me subscribe to their channel ? Do you need to get my Twitch password in order to buy them with my own account or will you buy them with your account and then give them to me? If you will give them, do I need to be connected to the channel when you will buy the sub and send it ?

comments.author: OwnerSeller
comments.body: I use discord cause of we can chat on private message.If you don't have discord , we can talk on private message on this forum.Im gifting subs from my account it can be show up anonymous or from my personal account.Could be 1-3-6 month and tier 1-2-3 too.If you want gifting 1-100 subs from your account.I need to log and send from your account.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: OwnerSeller on June 23, 2023, 09:05:08 PMI use discord cause of we can chat on private message.If you don't have discord , we can talk on private message on this forum.Im gifting subs from my account it can be show up anonymous or from my personal account.Could be 1-3-6 month and tier 1-2-3 too.If you want gifting 1-100 subs from your account.I need to log and send from your account.Ok Thank you.Do we have to send you the money before or after the subscriptions have been sent?If it's before, have you a thread showing some track records like transactions history, reviews or testimonies from your customers here or elsewhere? Because you are a brand new account, only 2 weeks and 4 messages old, so there is no guarantee you'll just take the money and don't deliver anything.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Has anyone used this service successfully to vouch for it? This is one of those seemingly too good to be true things. Especially when you consider how frequently chargebacks happen due to credit cards being used for this type of thing. OP - Are you doing any “vouch” subscriptions? Do you do Kick subscriptions as well or just Twitch?

comments.author: OwnerSeller
comments.created_time: August 11, 2023, 10:18:39 PMLast edit: August 11, 2023, 10:41:33 PM by OwnerSeller
comments.body: I don't have vouch on bitcointalk , im doing it Twitch gifting subs and Youtube membership gifting during live stream.If you have more questions feel free to ask me on discord.I have different feedbacks/review/vouch on different forums.If you wanna see it , i can send you in via discord.Gifting subs are not refundable.(https://help.twitch.tv/s/article/refunds-on-twitch?language=en_US#:~:text=Gift%20subscriptions%20are%20not%20refundable,where%20otherwise%20required%20by%20law.)

comments.author: TimtheYoutuber
comments.body: Quote from: OwnerSeller on August 11, 2023, 10:18:39 PMI don't have vouch on bitcointalk , im doing it Twitch gifting subs and Youtube membership gifting during live stream.If you have more questions feel free to ask me on discord.I have different feedbacks/review/vouch on different forums.If you wanna see it , i can send you in via discord.Gifting subs are not refundable.(https://help.twitch.tv/s/article/refunds-on-twitch?language=en_US#:~:text=Gift%20subscriptions%20are%20not%20refundable,where%20otherwise%20required%20by%20law.)The terms on twitch say that subs are non refundable unless error, fraud or other laws. So this would more than likely fall under fraud in which the streamer getting the subs would have them taken back.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: OwnerSeller on March 07, 2024, 08:10:48 PM12 month sub = 10$6 month sub = 5$3 month sub = 2.5$Price will change after 28 marchOn the OP it's written $3 for 3 months and $6 for 6months, so you're doing a promotion until 28 th march that's what you mean? Bitcoin fees are currently too high to make small transactions with it so what other cryptocurrencies with small transaction fees are you accepting for now? I would like to try with 5 subs to begin, in order to see if it's working because your prices are very cheap. You just need the name of the streamers we want to sub and our own account name, that's it? Quote from: OwnerSeller on June 09, 2023, 08:09:34 PM3 month sub = 3$6 month sub = 6$

comments.body: Thank you for replying me. Paying the service in LTC could be ok for me. I will try to contact you on Discord but maybe other people would also be curious to understand something. 3 months subscribing is a little bit more expensive than 3 single months. $2.5 > 3 x $0.8Does it mean you only accept 3months subscription at least and the price in OP is just an illustration of the virtual cost of 1 month, rounded though?
